name: IonSurge Pro
description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Civilian
Power plants from Lightning Power Ltd. don’t get much bigger or better than the IonSurge Pro. This top-of-the-line large power plant focuses on delivering solid results to keep your ship working longer.
description_cn:
物品类型：电源
制造商：闪电之力有限公司(Lightning Power Ltd.)
尺寸：3
等级：B
类别：民用
闪电之力有限公司的电源没有比"离子奔涌 Pro"更大更好的了.这个顶级的大型电源致力于提供可靠的能量输出,以使您的飞船拥有更长的工作时间.
